title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository—CLI and Go library for pulling, running and chatting with GGUF models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library providing sync & async interfaces to Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM, embeddings or tool-calling backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting synchronous, asynchronous and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive REPL wrapper with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and explanations.

title: ollama-codellama
summary: Official example Modelfiles showing how to serve CodeLlama variants with fill-in-the-middle support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama providing idiomatic client methods and streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line run commands and Compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + sentence-transformers + FAISS to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Official walk-through showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B with LoRA and import the weights into Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client and CLI for Ollama.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of official Modelfiles (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) maintained by Ollama.
